short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension Just Calculates the CGPA and SGPA of the selected Semesters & also Overal

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: *GPA Genie* extension Just Calculates the CGPA and SGPA of the selected Semesters. This extension uses AIMS Portal Data to calculate CGPA. It is developed for the *AIMS Portal*, IIIT Raichur by Shubham Dubey (CS23B1066).
